title: ChromaticAbberation appears to do nothing
description: When checked, the ChromaticAbberation filter does not appear to change th appearance of rendered image at all.

title: Rename from CameraDemo to FractalLens
description: Rename and filestructure to better reflect purpose of application. First lt lens that has been implemented is to generate julia sets, but more may follow

title: Zoom Experiment for BGRA
description: When using BGRA format, the outer edge of a rendered transform is all black. Evaluate whether zooming the rendered image in by various percentages, to eliminate this black border, would increase eventual detail of fractal under visual recursion.

title: Enable user to identify center point of what the camera is looking at
close_reason: Implemented center point with crosshair overlay and drag gesture

title: ContinuityCamera Issues
description: When a ContinuityCamera is selected, and user clicks 'disconnectcamera' on the phone, the camera does not show back up to be selected until phone is manually restarted

title: Blocky rendering near center
description: Portions of the transformed image near the origin appoften appear very pixelated. Consider if half-precision (16-bit float) math implementation in metallib implementation is cause. Issue is most apparent as rendered juliaset transitions between connected and disconnected rendered fractals. A connected fractal generally has a monochrome 'hole' in the center that overlays the central point where blockiness is most apparent.

comments.author: Isaac Sparling
comments.text: This extra blocky rendering is possibly due to the polar-warp nature of thethe z^2ansformation. Could a change to antialiasing logic help mitigate the pixelation?

title: remove chromatic abberation option and filter
